item.title: Group Meeting Gallery
item.description:
Group Meeting Gallery

Welcome to our group meeting photo gallery! This page showcases moments from our collaborative work sessions, discussions, and team activities.


Latest Group Photos


More photos coming soon! We regularly update this gallery with new group meeting memories.

item.title: Escola Secundária Luso-Chinesa de Luís Gonzaga Gomes in Macau Principals Delegation Visit and Exchange Lecture
item.description:
Team photo from the delegation visit at Jinan University, Guangzhou


Additional Photos

Keynote lecture presentation

Statements by the delegation

Group photo with students


Abstract

The Guangdong Institute of Smart Education at Jinan University hosted an exchange lecture titled “Practical Applications of AI-Empowered Teaching.” Attendees included Principal Huang Zhengzhi of Macau’s Gaomeishi Sino-Portuguese Middle School and Luo Ying, Deputy Director of Jinan University’s Admissions Office. Associate Professor Zheng Jiaqi from the Institute served as the keynote speaker.

Centered on educational innovation in the AI era, the event featured opening remarks by Deputy Director Luo Ying and insights from Principal Huang Zhengzhi on frontline educators’ exploration and outlook for AI-driven education. Associate Professor Zheng Jiaqi delivered a presentation titled “Toward a New Smart Education Ecosystem: Technology Empowerment and Holistic Practice.” Through case studies and interactive discussions, she systematically introduced innovative AI applications in teaching scenarios to enhance classroom quality and efficiency. Participating teachers engaged actively in lively on-site exchanges.

This event represents the Institute’s practical efforts to advance the integration of government, industry, academia, research, and application. It aims to promote the adoption and dissemination of smart education outcomes in basic education, injecting new momentum into the digital transformation of education.

Event Details

  • Date: November 15, 2025
  • Location: Jinan University, Guangzhou
  • Host Institution: The Guangdong Institute of Smart Education at Jinan University
  • Keynote Speaker: Jia-Qi Zheng

item.title: Participant, the 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee
item.description:
Group photo after the meeting


Abstract

Participant at the 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee of the China Association for Non-Government Education held in Beijing in September 2025. This meeting brought together educational professionals and experts to discuss strategic directions and initiatives in smart education.

Event Details

  • Date: September 2025
  • Location: Beijing
  • Event: The 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee
  • Hosting Organization: China Association for Non-Government Education
  • Role: Participant

Audience

This council meeting convened professionals and leaders in the smart education field from the China Association for Non-Government Education to collaboratively advance smart education initiatives and policy discussions.

item.title: Elected Executive Committee Member, the 1st China Human–Machine Computing Conference
item.description:
The 1st China Human–Machine Computing Conference & the 21st National Symposium


Abstract

Elected as an Executive Committee Member of the 1st China Human–Machine Computing Conference and the 21st National Symposium on Harmonious Human–Machine Environment held in Dalian in August 2025. This position recognizes contributions to the field of human-machine interaction and computing research.

Event Details

  • Date: August 2025
  • Location: Dalian
  • Event: The 1st China Human–Machine Computing Conference & the 21st National Symposium on Harmonious Human–Machine Environment
  • Role: Elected Executive Committee Member

Audience

This conference brings together researchers, academics, and professionals in the field of human-machine computing and interaction to discuss latest developments and innovations in the field.

item.title: Mingzhu Education Group’s 2025 Conference: Strategizing for a Future of High-Quality, Collaborative Education
item.description:
Participants at the education work conference


Additional Photos

Keynote presentation at the education work conference

Conference session and networking


Abstract

Keynote speaker at the 2025 Education Work Conference & Leadership Training hosted by Mingzhu Education Group in Guangzhou. This conference gathered educational leaders and teachers to discuss innovations in education, share best practices in school management and teaching, and explore AI-enabled education transformation, fostering professional growth and collaborative development.

Event Details

  • Date: August 2025
  • Location: Mingzhu Education Group, Guangzhou
  • Host Institution: Mingzhu Education Group
  • Role: Keynote Speaker

Audience

The conference was designed for education administrators, principals, teachers, and staff from all campuses of Mingzhu Education Group. Participants engaged in thematic training and exchange sessions aimed at enhancing leadership, teaching competence, and school governance capabilities.

item.title: the 12th Summer School on Data Science and Engineering
item.description:
The 12th Summer School on Data Science and Engineering


Abstract

Keynote speaker at the 12th Summer School on Data Science and Engineering held at East China Normal University in Shanghai in July 2025. This prestigious summer school brought together researchers, students, and professionals in the field of data science and engineering to share knowledge, discuss latest developments, and foster collaborative learning in this rapidly evolving discipline.

Event Details

  • Date: July 2025
  • Location: East China Normal University, Shanghai
  • Event: the 12th Summer School on Data Science and Engineering
  • Role: Keynote Speaker

Audience

This summer school was designed for graduate students, researchers, and professionals interested in data science and engineering to engage in advanced training, lectures, and networking with leading experts in the field.

item.title: Exchange Seminar for Mainland Study Tours for Hong Kong Promoted Teachers
item.description:
Exchange seminar for Hong Kong promoted teachers

Abstract

Keynote speaker at the Exchange Seminar for Mainland Study Tours for Hong Kong Promoted Teachers held at Jinan University in Guangzhou in June 2025. This seminar facilitated exchange and professional development between promoted teachers from Hong Kong and mainland educators, fostering cross-cultural educational collaboration and sharing of best practices.

Event Details

  • Date: June 2025
  • Location: Jinan University, Guangzhou
  • Event: Exchange Seminar for Mainland Study Tours for Hong Kong Promoted Teachers
  • Role: Keynote Speaker
